EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Pivotal/Aridhia Disrupts Tech Approach_Q316.Post-event 8-16-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining Aridhia and Pivotal for the webinar Challenges in Clinical Research
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/challenges-in-clinical-research]]>
Thank you for your interest in our webinar Challenges in Clinical Research: Aridhia Disrupts Technology Approach to Research Analytics. We hope you found it enjoyable and informative as you explore your Big Data technology options. As mentioned during the webinar, you can view the recording and download the slide deck at the links below:
- Watch the webinar recording <[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/challenges-in-clinical-research]]> - Download the webinar presentation <[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/challenges-in-clinical-research]]>
Additional Big Data and analytics resources:
- Blog: National Cancer Moonshot Shines Light on Challenges of Data Sharing <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/features/national-cancer-moonshot-shines-light-on-challenges-of-data-sharing]]> - White Paper: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[http://pivotal.io/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]> - White Paper: Big & Fast Data: The Democratization of Information <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/white-paper/capgemini-big-fast-data-democratization-of-information]]> - Analyst Report: Transforming Business Results with Big Data and Analytics <[[http://pivotal.io/transforming-business-results-with-big-data-and-analytics]]> - Analyst Report: Operationalizing the Buzz: Big Data Analytics <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/analyst-report/operationalizing-the-buzz]]>
If you would like more information or have any questions about Big Data and data science, submit your question and contact information at pivotal.io/contact <[[mailto:pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
